title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Eli Manning on Super Bowl Memories + Best SB Bets with Millman, Fake Q's on Harden/Simmons Trade, Brady Rumors
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Eli Manning on Super Bowl Memories + Best SB Bets with Millman, Fake Q's on Harden/Simmons Trade, Brady Rumors
description:
Colin does Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00) on long disgruntled Ben Simmons being shipped out of Philly for James Harden, what the trade means for KD, if Aaron Rodgers anti-vaxx stance should affect his MVP chances, why Caleb Williams made the right move ditching Oklahoma for USC, and if there’s any legs to the rumor that Tom Brady could make an NFL return. Then, 2-time Super Bowl winning QB Eli Manning discusses if he was nervous before his Super Bowls (12:00), if his famous Super Bowl 46 dime to Mario Manningham is the best throw of his career (13:00), what he learned from his first Super Bowl that helped him prepare for his second (14:00), what he sees in Joe Burrow that has made him so good so early in his career (20:00), why OBJ has had such a resurgence with the Rams (22:00), how Matt Stafford's trade to the Rams has changed his career arc (24:00), where the Manning brothers fine tuned their sense of humor (26:00). Then, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his Super Bowl prop bets are sharp or square. (29:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
